data.title: Postal/ZIP code of Nepal – Kathmandu, Pokhara, Chitwan, Birgunj, Butwal
data.meta_description: The Postal ZIP code of Kathmandu, Nepal is 44600, Pokhara is 33700, Butwal is 32907, Nepalgunj is 21900, Chitwan is 44200. Click for all the Postal codes
data.text:
The Postal ZIP code of Kathmandu, Nepal is 44600, Pokhara is 33700, Butwal is 32907, Nepalgunj is 21900, Chitwan is 44200, Birgunj is 44300.

Please use this search option if you didn’t find your 5 digit postal code in the first page.

Why Do I need 5 digit postal code ?

You need 5 digit Postal / Zip (PIN) code for different purposes. For example if you want to send some parcel or documents to Kathmandu, Nepal from United states then you must need an ZIP/POSTAL/PIN code of your place or nearest POST office.

What is My Zip code ?

Simple, your postal code is same as the pace you are living. For example, if you are living in Kathmandu (Sundhara) then your zip code is 44600.

How can i use POSTAL/ZIP/PIN code ?

Find the zip code you need, and mix it with address after writing district.

For Eg:

xyz road, ward no. 06

old baneshwor

Kathmandu, 44600

Nepal

What is the Address format of Nepal ? (Updated 2020)

(House Number: 322)

Address line 1: Street_Address_line_1 (for eg: Annapurna Road, Ward Number 9 )

City/Town: (for eg: Pokhara)

State/Province: Province name or number

District : (for eg: Kaski )

Zip code: XXX XXX

How do I write my shipping address to get products in Nepal from foreign country ?

If you provide the shipping address as above standard forget your product. It’s nearly impossible to receive any product in that way. Even the post office authorities can’t figure out how to ship that product to you. Make sure you include 2/3 phone numbers in your shipping address. How? there’s always an optional field to fill out in the shipping address that is Address line 2 (Optional). In that optional field you can write like, Address line 2: Phone 98XXX-XX-XXX
